text: Sunrise Communications AG (commonly known as Sunrise), is a Swiss telecommunications provider based in Zurich. As a telecommunications company, it offered mobile and fixed-network services under its own name as well as with various mobile communications providers. As a result of the merger with UPC Switzerland, Sunrise Communications AG was deleted and UPC Switzerland was transformed into Sunrise GmbH. == Other websites == * Sunrise Category:Telephone companies of Europe Category:Technology companies of Switzerland
title: Sunrise Communications
